mema prathipalaya ketharam sthirada yath meya putinta pawa kammali janadhipathiwaranayak bawata pathwa thibenawa wiya haki yayi ek lekhakayeku sandahan kara thibini. 2000 wasare palamuwarata rusiyawe janadhipathi padawiyata path putin me wanawita wasara 14 k ema dhuraye katayuthu kara thibe. 2000 sita 2004 dakwa siya palamu dhurakalaye katayuthu kirimen pasu 2004 pawathi janadhipathiwaranayenda ohu jaya labuweya.
